name: Tortilla Soup I
author: Joelene Craver
summary: This is a favorite among us Texans, and there are so many diverse ways to prepare it. I have experimented with more entailed recipes, and came up with this one which is just as delicious as the labor intensive ones. Pass around chopped cilantro, cubed avocados, and crumbled Jack cheese for garnish.
ingredients: 2  fresh jalapeno peppers, sliced into rings
6 (6 inch) corn tortillas, cut into strips and toasted for garnish
directions: In heavy pot, bring the broth to a boil
Add garlic, tomatoes, chopped onion, jalapeno, and oregano to the stocks
Broil the sliced onions until soft and a little brown
Add broiled onions, chicken, lime juice to soup, and simmer till chicken is heated
Place toasted tortilla strips in each bowl and pour soup over strips
